channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5 Resurfaces Its Worst Episode Ever
item.description: Stranger Things season 5 has some problems, but the twist in one storyline harkens back to the worst moment of the series.

item.title: Build a better alternative to Black Friday

item.title: “Our GPUs Are Melting” Warns Sora Boss As New Limits Are Imposed
item.description: OpenAI imposes new limits on the number of videos non-paying users can generate, after the company struggles to meet demand on its servers.

item.title: NYT Strands Hints, Spangram, Answers: Saturday, November 29 (What A Piece Of Work!)
